title: 'Very Poor and Fake Readings'
body: 'Even after 750 meters walk it shows 0 Calories & 0 Distance. After 10000+ steps walking it shows 2000steps only. Heart Beat Count also showing very low. Waste of Money. Better try BeatXp works good than this scrap.'

title: 'Nice smartwatch'
body: The smartwatch is nice but accidentally I broke its screen and it is now nowhere available. Even the people from the BOAT service center told us that its display can't be changed. So now it has become a complete waste for me. Otherwise, the smartwatch contains nice features, a lot of sports mode, and even give quite good accuracy in measuring important vitals.

title: 'Calling issue'

title: 'Value for money but with certain problems'
body: 'Pros : Big display
column5: multiple watch face option and almost accurate in measuring vitals.  Cons : Connecting with bluetooth is not smooth. Encountered connectivity issues several times. Not receiving notifications from whatsapp inspite of enabling it in the app. Biggest con I see is it counts even a two wheeler ride as walking steps. Not sure whether it is a technical issue but needs to be fixed at priority. It counts 200 steps for 1km two wheeler ride and keeps on increasing as we ride longer. This creates miscalculation in terms of daily walking steps.  Overall a good product in terms of look and feel but lacks in in connectivity and technical errors.'

title: 'Battery Issue'
body: There is a serious battery issue with this model...I charge watch in the morning to 100% and without connecting Bluetooth the battery is drained to 0 at night. I have to charge my watch daily which I wasn't expecting.
